channel.title: Moparscape offline?
channel.description:
Moparscape offline?
I have diel up so you all must kno i have lag alot I MEAN ALOT! and i whould like a world all to my self offline so i dont have to be on the internet and can have the world all to myself I am greedy like that i need a whole world to myself heheh can somone help me out with that?
Weather it is with moparscape or weather it is another program i have to download can somone tell me how i whould go about doing it?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2007, 04:41:15 PM[/size][hr]ahhhhh come on help me!! its ben like 40 minutes and no respons

item.title: Moparscape offline?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

when you start the mopar client, just go to enter, enter your name and pass and log on, simple as that, the i.p address 127.0.0.1 is already there, you just log onti it, which is hybrid server. svescape is a source froma player who created that server and is realesing it to players so that they can edit it and run it as their server.

Read full topic

Please but it in like steps like 1 2 3 cause i thought i was good at hacking and junk but wow i dont understand now… plz somone help![/glow]
